traits.description:
Increase final damage by **13%**. While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.

While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

Increase final damage by **18%**. While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.

While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.
